ygData.subject: Re: Bard quests
ygData.msgSnippet: Well I saw the lambent legs earlier today on a fellow bard so it s doable, least on E ci. Naeeldar ... From: Kyle Sibbald  To:
ygData.messageBody:
Well I saw the lambent legs earlier today on a fellow bard so it's doable,
least on E'ci.

Naeeldar

-----Original Message-----
From: Kyle Sibbald <ksibbald@...>
To: eqbards@onelist.com <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Friday, October 15, 1999 12:57 PM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Bard quests


>From: "Kyle Sibbald" <ksibbald@...>
>
> Genni is currently broken at least on Cazic Thule, prolly on all servers.
>I've heard tales that she was removed from game bacuse she would drop
>megacash for loot and people were camping her. I've also heard that she
>kills herself almost immediately upon spawning.
>
> This would mean that the only things that can be gotten (as far as I
>haven't heard) are the boots and the vambraces. The other pieces require
>Star Ruby Lambent, made by Genni, and Fire Opal Lambent, in which the fire
>opals are sold by Genni. I saw on the list that a Gypsy Lute was found in
>Mistmoore so the BP quest is prolly not broken, just was the wrong item.
>
> Good Journey,
>
> Sineras Silverlyre (Cazic-Thule)
>
>
>8)-----Original Message-----
>8)From: Greg Gillan [mailto:GGillan@...]
>8)Sent: Friday, October 15, 1999 8:42 AM
>8)To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
>8)Subject: RE: [eqbards] Bard quests
>8)
>8)
>8)From: Greg Gillan <GGillan@...>
>8)
>8)I've gotten the arms. Karnek has the pants, and I saw
>8)another bard sporting
>8)the helm. Only problem I've heard about is with the
>8)breastplate. I'm going
>8)to try the boots tonight probably (whoo hoo! got another
>8)lambent stone), so
>8)we'll see what happens. I'm guessing its just the BP.
>8)Genni is definately in the temple, I don't remember the
>8)location, but I was
>8)able to deal with him. He's in a seperate location from the bards.
>8)
>8)
>8)Elwyn
>8)
>8)-----Original Message-----

>8)
>8)From: John Robertson <johnr@...>
>8)
>8)
>8)Last night I acquired the fixin's for two of the bard quests (arms and
>8)boots), but when I got to the Temple, another bard told me
>8)that all the
>8)bard quests were broken, according to a GM, and that nobody could find
>8)Genni, the person who makes the lambent gems, anyway.
>8)
>8)Did people have trouble making any of the pieces of armour besides the
>8)previously mentioned breastplate problems?
>8)
>8)Jyzan, Karana
>8)
